_source.short_desc: Over 1,300 L&D teams around the world partner with LearnUpon LMS to execute their learning strategy and hit their learning goals.
_source.long_desc:
At LearnUpon LMS we're on a mission to help you unlock the power of learning. Combining our award winning LMS and our industry-leading Customer Experience team, we pride ourselves on being a trusted partner to over 1,300 businesses.

Every day, L&D teams around the world choose LearnUpon's intuitive, feature-rich and deeply integrate-able platform to deliver a connected learning experience to millions of learners across their employees, partners and customers. Plans start at $15,000 USD.
_source.pricing_details:
LearnUpon offers a standard SaaS subscription model, consisting of several price bands. Each price band includes a set number of 'Active Users' and one or more 'Portals'.

What plan you select will also depend on your feature and support requirements. As you consider our proposed pricing, we encourage you to review what is available in the context of your organization's needs.

As the first step in your LMS partnership with LearnUpon, your LearnUpon Account Executive (AE) will listen to your requirements to ensure your use case is a good fit, and recommend a LearnUpon plan to fit your specific usage, feature, and support requirements.

Contact us to request an intro to one of our expert (super friendly!) AEs

US / Canada (Toll Free)
+1 888 908 3960

UK
+44 203 642 7679

Ireland
+353 1 531 0121

Australia
+61 283 111 209
_source.target_audience: LearnUpon works with global organizations who want to make learning a central part of their growth strategy and supports over 1,300 customers worldwide including Zendesk and Gusto.

media.caption: Configure portals for each training audience: We call them learning portals ? you might call them instances or environments. Portals enable you to create and manage unique training environments for different audiences, from one place.

Boost learner engagement with an LMS focused on the learner: With interactive features and a leading user experience, use LearnUpon to create training that your learners want to complete ? whenever they want, and wherever they are.
Motivate learners with Gamification and leaderboards: Encourage your team to hit their goals and place a spotlight on the best performing learners.

Design content in a range of formats: Easily create versatile learning programs ? extensive and multi-part or small and bitesize ? with a range of interactive content options, including webinar, SCORM and xAPI files, documents, and video.
Build a bigger picture of training performance: Use Reports to track user progression, exam results, survey responses, training histories, and much more - with export-ready or custom reports.

category_features.name: Gamification
category_features.definition: Games or game-like elements to track progress and reward accomplishments

category_features.name: Built-in Course Authoring
category_features.definition: Tools that allow you to create and publish courses and course material/content

category_features.name: Content Sharing
category_features.definition: Digitally share pre-made materials and self-created content with others

category_features.name: Employee Portal
category_features.definition: Online gateway through which employees can access and track their own information and metrics

category_features.name: Gamification
category_features.definition: Games or game-like elements to track progress and reward accomplishments

category_features.name: Microlearning
category_features.definition: Distribute training content in bite-size pieces that can be consumed in short periods of time

category_features.name: Mobile Learning
category_features.definition: Access for students to complete learning materials on mobile platforms

category_features.name: Multi-User Collaboration
category_features.definition: Two-way actions and data sharing between several users in real time

category_features.name: Recommendations
category_features.definition: Suggestions that appear as user is utilizing the system

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Self-Service Content Curation
category_features.definition: Assembling information about a topic of interest and building content paths without assistance from third parties

category_features.name: Social Learning
category_features.definition: Create tools to promote social interaction and learning between students/trainees and instructors/trainers

category_features.name: Third Party Course Library
category_features.definition: A set of pre-made courses offered by a third party

related_products.short_desc: iSpring Suite is the ultimate authoring toolkit for creating professional eLearning courses in a familiar PowerPoint environment.
related_products.features: iSpring Suite is an all-in-one authoring toolkit that allows users to create interactive content for any eLearning scenario and work on it together with their team and stakeholders online. With iSpring Suite, users can design e-courses with videos, screencasts, interactive assessments, quizzes, role-plays, and more. Courses made with iSpring Suite are compatible with any LMS. The tool has no learning curve - exactly what you need to meet deadlines.

related_products.short_desc: An all-in-one training platform that helps you build courses and share them with your users. TalentLMS: where great teams go to grow.
related_products.features: TalentLMS is the LMS built for training success. Designed to get a "yes" from everyone, it?s where great teams, and companies, go to grow. With an experience that's fully customizable and easy to manage, teams embrace training while feeling right at home. TalentLMS makes it easy to build courses from scratch inside the platform or use SCORM, xAPI and cmi5 files. On a mission to democratize training, TalentLMS already serves 70, 000+ teams worldwide.

related_products.short_desc: Articulate 360 has everything businesses need to easily create beautiful, interactive e-learning that looks great on any device.
related_products.features: Articulate 360 is the #1 creator platform for workplace learning. Easily create online learning, for any device, with top-rated creator tools. One subscription opens endless e-learning possibilities with 9+ million course assets, including 1,000+ prebuilt templates with real and placeholder content on relevant topics, an easy-to-use review tool for stakeholders, and live and on-demand online training. Beautiful, interactive online learning is just a few clicks away with Articulate 360.

related_products.short_desc: SAP Litmos LMS includes a built-in eLearning authoring tool that enables the creation of dynamic, mobile-responsive SCORM content.
related_products.features: SAP Litmos Training is a powerful but easy-to-use LMS that includes a built-in eLearning authoring tool that enables learning professionals to create dynamic, mobile-responsive, visually-appealing SCORM content within the system. Designed to support everyone from the novice trainer to the expert instructional designer, this eliminates the need for costly external content creation applications and makes the job of developing and delivering training much more streamlined and efficient.

related_products.short_desc: Sibme is an online web and mobile learning and engagement platform to improve professional skills at scale.
related_products.features:
Sibme empowers teams, schools, institutions, and learning organizations to create meaningful job-embedded learning experiences that is people-driven and interactive.

Enable more frequent and authentic conversations about the work you do on a daily basis and improve skills on your teams today!

related_products.short_desc: Thinkific is an all-in-one platform that empowers experts & teachers to quickly create and deliver stunning courses on their own sites.
related_products.features:
Thinkific is an all-in-one online course platform that empowers anyone to quickly create and deliver stunning courses on their own branded site. Whether your goal is to educate your customers, to sell courses to earn revenue or to simply grow your brand and engage your audience, Thinkific makes it easy.

Join thousands of consultants, experts, authors, speakers, trainers, teachers, coaches, professional associations, and companies, and start selling courses on Thinkific today.

related_products.short_desc: Easy LMS has all the tools you need to take your employee and customer training to the next level, but it's much easier to use.
related_products.features: Built in the Netherlands by a multicultural team, Easy LMS is the coolest and most user-friendly LMS on the market. Easy LMS has the simple and to-the-point Dutch design that makes it much easier to use than any other platforms out there. Also, it's fairly-priced and available in many languages. Request a demo today and see for yourself!

related_products.short_desc: Create online courses and coaching services. Control your branding, student data, messaging and pricing all from one place.
related_products.features:
Teachable is an online courses and coaching creation software that allows entrepreneurs, creators, and businesses of all sizes create personalized engaging online courses and coaching products complete with videos, lectures, and quizzes. 

Collect payments through Teachable so you don't have to handle any of the nitty gritty around VAT, taxes, and author payments. Track sales, gain insights into sold courses, and collect feedback via surveys on a unified dashboard. All with zero tech headaches.

related_products.short_desc: Graphy (formerly Spayee) offers an all-in-one white-labeled platform for content creators to create, market & sell their courses.
related_products.features:
Graphy (formerly Spayee) offers an all-in-one platform for content creators to create, market & sell their courses. 

The DIY platform allows creators to create & launch white-labeled websites & mobile apps for hosting, marketing & selling their courses along with automated payment gateways.

The platform also offers all the needed Marketing & Engagement tools to sell your courses and engage your audience. 

Graphy offers you everything you need to run your online learning platform.

related_products.short_desc: SkyPrep Studio allows content creators to create rich, engaging, and interactive learning content with minimal effort.
related_products.features:
SkyPrep is an intuitive LMS with a built-in content authoring tool that lets you create engaging content right from the training platform. It embodies the top key elements of an effective authoring tool: seamless functionality, intuitive user-friendly interface, and adaptive content design. 

With a variety of content blocks to choose from in building out your content like text, images, videos, questions, charts and more, you'll be sure to make your courses stand out and make a greater impact.

related_products.short_desc: A flexible elearning authoring tool that helps authors through 9 different question types, multimedia support, and tech integrations.
related_products.features: Classtime is a flexible elearning authoring tool created to help you design your course the way you've always imagined it. With our nine question types, multimedia support, engaging Collaborate Challenges, a student portal, a large question library, and tech integrations, you can use our platform create and distribute content for any subject at any age.

similar_products.short_desc: iSpring Suite is the ultimate authoring toolkit for creating professional eLearning courses in a familiar PowerPoint environment.
similar_products.features: iSpring Suite is an all-in-one authoring toolkit that allows users to create interactive content for any eLearning scenario and work on it together with their team and stakeholders online. With iSpring Suite, users can design e-courses with videos, screencasts, interactive assessments, quizzes, role-plays, and more. Courses made with iSpring Suite are compatible with any LMS. The tool has no learning curve - exactly what you need to meet deadlines.

similar_products.short_desc: LearnWorlds is a powerful, fully-customizable eLearning platform, ideal to create, develop and sell branded online courses or content.
similar_products.features: With LearnWorlds - the all-in-one eLearning authoring platform, you can speed up the eLearning development process and build highly engaging courses in minutes. Bring learning to life using interactive videos, images, PDFs, ebooks, synchronized transcripts, SCORM files, quizzes, a white-label mobile app, and more! Organize and deliver all your supporting learning resources and microlearning materials in one place. Create unique learning experiences that your learners will love and remember!

similar_products.short_desc: Articulate 360 has everything businesses need to easily create beautiful, interactive e-learning that looks great on any device.
similar_products.features: Articulate 360 is the #1 creator platform for workplace learning. Easily create online learning, for any device, with top-rated creator tools. One subscription opens endless e-learning possibilities with 9+ million course assets, including 1,000+ prebuilt templates with real and placeholder content on relevant topics, an easy-to-use review tool for stakeholders, and live and on-demand online training. Beautiful, interactive online learning is just a few clicks away with Articulate 360.

similar_products.short_desc: HowToo is an AI enabled upskilling platform that unlocks your workplace knowledge and transforms it into beautiful digital courses.
similar_products.features: HowToo is the only elearning authoring tool your team will want to use. Full of ready-to-go content, simply copy and paste your content into our huge library of templates. Add quizzes and assessment blocks with a click of a button and launch in just minutes. With the powerful insights of data, research and analytics we have created a tool that allows you to build incredible learning experiences for success. We're also the first to meet the WCAG AA 2.1 standard.

similar_products.short_desc: An all-in-one training platform that helps you build courses and share them with your users. TalentLMS: where great teams go to grow.
similar_products.features: TalentLMS is the LMS built for training success. Designed to get a "yes" from everyone, it?s where great teams, and companies, go to grow. With an experience that's fully customizable and easy to manage, teams embrace training while feeling right at home. TalentLMS makes it easy to build courses from scratch inside the platform or use SCORM, xAPI and cmi5 files. On a mission to democratize training, TalentLMS already serves 70, 000+ teams worldwide.

similar_products.short_desc: Meet TalentCards: the mobile learning platform built to train deskless employees. Build courses online and deliver them on smartphones.
similar_products.features:
Meet TalentCards, the eLearning authoring tool that puts training in your people's hands, no matter where they are in the world. Unlike traditional LMSs and training software, TalentCards is built for mobile, frontline, and deskless employees- people whose jobs keep them on the move.

Build powerful eLearning courses online and deliver them to your team's smartphones. Deliver training on safety, compliance, sales, product knowledge, soft skills, and more, without interrupting the work day.

similar_products.short_desc: Create online courses from your PowerPoint or video, add assessments and publish them to your LMS.
similar_products.features:
ScormHero is the easiest and most affordable e-learning authoring tool to create your scorm compliant course from PowerPoint presentations, videos, or documents. 

With more than 30.000 users in more than 170 countries, content creators use ScormHero to create unique learning experiences for their audience, using the most prominent features such as knowledge checks, assessments, video lessons, voice-over, among others.

Join the learning revolution. Try ScormHero today!

similar_products.short_desc: Our cloud-based e-learning authoring tool empowers anyone to create and share interactive learning content.
similar_products.features: Easygenerator is an award-winning e-learning authoring solution that simplifies and accelerates your organization's learning development. We are proud to provide our software to over 50,000 users in more than 150 countries. Our cloud-based tool empowers subject matter experts to share their knowledge in the form of interactive e-learning content. With a user-friendly interface and personalized support services, we make it easy for anyone to start creating engaging online courses and resources.

similar_products.short_desc: SAP Litmos LMS includes a built-in eLearning authoring tool that enables the creation of dynamic, mobile-responsive SCORM content.
similar_products.features: SAP Litmos Training is a powerful but easy-to-use LMS that includes a built-in eLearning authoring tool that enables learning professionals to create dynamic, mobile-responsive, visually-appealing SCORM content within the system. Designed to support everyone from the novice trainer to the expert instructional designer, this eliminates the need for costly external content creation applications and makes the job of developing and delivering training much more streamlined and efficient.

similar_products.short_desc: LMS365 is a learning platform designed specifically for the modern digital workplace in Microsoft 365 and Teams.
similar_products.features: LMS365 aims to empower organizations in the modern digital workplace through learning. With over 4 million users in 60+ countries globally, it is the only cloud-based learning platform built into Microsoft 365. With its seamless integration with the host of Microsoft's modern workplace tools, LMS365 becomes more than just a platform for employee learning and training management; it becomes an all-in-one integrated learning solution for the digital age.

similar_products.short_desc: Microlearning that lets you simplify production, lower costs, & create breakthrough engagement.
similar_products.features: Kill boring. Relieve yourself from a ponderous production process. Make any subject matter a fun, almost addictive learning experience. Create microlearning courses and automate their delivery based on an employee's status. Garner high-fives and gratitude from your employees who hotly await new content to be released.

similar_products.short_desc: Thinkific is an all-in-one platform that empowers experts & teachers to quickly create and deliver stunning courses on their own sites.
similar_products.features:
Thinkific is an all-in-one online course platform that empowers anyone to quickly create and deliver stunning courses on their own branded site. Whether your goal is to educate your customers, to sell courses to earn revenue or to simply grow your brand and engage your audience, Thinkific makes it easy.

Join thousands of consultants, experts, authors, speakers, trainers, teachers, coaches, professional associations, and companies, and start selling courses on Thinkific today.

similar_products.short_desc: The eloomi eLearning authoring tool is an easy-to-use content builder that allows you to create & export unique SCORM learning courses.
similar_products.features: By using the eloomi eLearning authoring tool, you can build powerful and effective learning experiences to develop and motivate your employees. When creating your own course, eloomi Authoring offers a variety of options to make the content more compelling. You can choose to add quizzes, videos, or images, and enhance the design with content blocks, your company logo and more interactive elements. eloomi Authoring is an easy-to-use tool that gives you complete control over layout and content.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Course Authoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Course Authoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Course authoring software enables organizations to develop customized training courses for educating employees, or for teachers to develop courses for their students. Course content can often be imported from multiple applications, and presented in different media formats. Once developed, courses can be published through a Learning Management System (LMS) or Training software, or as stand alone computer / web based training.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Learning Management Systems (LMS) on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Learning Management Systems (LMS) and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Learning Management Systems (LMS) provide a framework through which learning content is delivered and managed. An LMS allows for an anytime, anywhere learning environment, delivering and tracking eLearning courses and testing. A Learning Content Management System (LCMS) enables the organization to learn content from Courseware authoring tools and presentation of the content to students. Learning Management Systems are related to Training software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Training software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Training tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Training software, also known as eLearning or Computer-Based Training (CBT) software, automates educational activities for students and/or corporate employees. Training solutions are often customizable based on the needs of specific organizations and include capabilities such as course registration and testing, certification tracking, conferencing, skills tracking, and reporting. Training applications may provide the framework for presenting classes, as well as an ecommerce functions, to allow for payments. Training software is related to Courseware and Learning Management Systems (LMS).

related_products.short_desc: Canvas is the LMS for everybody, connecting all stakeholders in one location.
related_products.features: Open, intuitive, and born in the cloud, Canvas LMS has become the most widely used learning management system by colleges and universities in North America, and the fastest growing worldwide. Delivering dynamic, engaging learning experiences, its 99.99% uptime ensures instant connection between students and educators, anywhere, anytime.  Visit us at www.instructure.com

related_products.short_desc: Free online learning management system, providing educators around the world with an open source solution for e-learning.
related_products.features: Improve your teaching and learner outcomes with Moodle LMS, the customisable open source learning management system used by over 300 million people in over 100 languages worldwide. Our feature-rich platform is secure and scalable, integrates seamlessly with third-party platforms and plugins, and allows teachers to create engaging, accessible and active learning experiences.

related_products.short_desc: Easily and consistently educate your employees as you engage them with on-demand training.
related_products.features: Paycom provides user-friendly HR and payroll technology to enhance the entire employee life cycle, all in a single software. From onboarding and benefits enrollment to talent management and more, Paycom streamlines processes, drives efficiencies, increases data integrity and gives employees power over their own HR information through a self-service app. Easily educate your employees as you engage them with on-demand training by creating your own courses or using our built-in library of courses.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based HCM platform bringing together payroll, time + attendance, and HR for organisations with between 500 and 50,000 employees.
related_products.features: Dayforce is a global HCM platform that transforms the employee experience. It unifies data from across the entire employee lifecycle to enable better decision-making at every level. Dayforce is a comprehensive cloud platform that combines HR, payroll, workforce management and talent management in a single application. Our scalable platform is built with a single, flexible rules engine combined with real-time updates and calculations that help address complex regulatory requirements.

related_products.short_desc: Train employees, partners and customers effectively with a next-gen LXP that delivers a personalized learning experience at scale.
related_products.features:
Train employees, partners and customers effectively with a next-gen LMS. Deliver an enhanced & enjoyable learning experience for your learners. Address skill gaps and drive personalized learning at scale
Experience a world-class enterprise LMS from Adobe that is: 
1. Awarded for excellence across multiple categories
2. Recognized by leading analysts and industry bodies
3. Used by millions of engaged learners
4. Preferred by Fortune 500 enterprises

related_products.short_desc: TalentLMS is the LMS built for training success. Easy to manage and a joy to use, teams embrace training from the very first click.
related_products.features: TalentLMS is the LMS built for training success. Designed to get a "yes" from everyone, it's where great teams, and companies, go to grow. With an experience that's fully customizable and easy to manage, teams embrace training while feeling right at home. TalentLMS makes it easy to provide the right training to any team and every use, while giving expert guidance and support every step of the way. On a mission to democratize training, TalentLMS already serves 70, 000+ teams worldwide.

related_products.short_desc: Schoology, a PowerSchool company, is the education technology company putting collaboration at the heart of the learning experience.
related_products.features: Schoology seamlessly connects learning management with assessments so that school districts can improve student performance, foster collaboration throughout their community, and personalize learning for every student. Every day millions of students, parents, faculty and administrators from nearly 2,000 K-12 school districts leverage Schoology to advance what is possible in education.

related_products.short_desc: Through our innovative technology and services, Blackboard helps organizations turn learning into a strategic advantage.
related_products.features: Blackboard is the largest learning company in the world. With over 100 million learners and 20 years of experience, we've perfected the art of effective learning. We've helped over 700 corporate and government organizations around the world deliver outcomes-based learning that drives employee growth in a measurable way. Our unified learning ecosystem of both technology and services provides a trusted one-stop solution that powers learning programs that make employees and organizations thrive.

related_products.short_desc: The easy-to-use, modern LMS for modern teams. Onboard, train, track, and test on every need-to-know for every role and responsibility.
related_products.features: Trainual is built for fast-growing businesses eager to document every process, policy, role, and responsibility in one simple, searchable system, with training modules and tests for built-in accountability. The easiest way to build your online training manuals and ensure consistent training every time. Quickly becoming one the top LMS products on the market. Simple flat rate plans for all size teams.

related_products.short_desc: Compliance & CE is a complete learning management solution for your laboratory.
related_products.features: Compliance & CE is a complete learning solution for your laboratory. Provide safety training, P.A.C.E.-approved continuing education, and custom courses and checklists to your employees in one cost-effective online system.

related_products.short_desc: SAP Litmos Training delivers powerful but easy-to-use LMS features for admins and learners alike, and a built-in content library.
related_products.features: SAP Litmos Training delivers powerful but easy-to-use LMS features for admins and learners alike. It's known for quick deployment and simple integration with other key business systems, as well as automation of formerly time-consuming tasks, such as user onboarding and reporting. It offers custom UI branding and dashboards, built-in content authoring, and access to a large library of off-the-shelf content. Other popular features include video assessments, gamification, and mobile responsiveness.

similar_products.short_desc: 360Learning is the LMS for collaborative learning. We help companies upskill from within by turning internal SMEs into growth drivers.
similar_products.features: Your employees have valuable knowledge, and you need to tap into it. Now, you can. 360Learning enables companies to upskill from within by turning their experts into champions for employee, customer, and partner growth. With our LMS for collaborative learning, L&D teams can accelerate upskilling with the help of internal experts instead of top-down training. 360Learning is the easiest way to onboard and upskill employees, train customer-facing teams, and enable customers-all from one place.

similar_products.short_desc: LMS designed to help healthcare organizations create, manage, and track learning, training, and compliance for the entire workforce.
similar_products.features: A modern, customizable healthcare workforce learning platform, that allows your organization to strategically manage and continuously develop your staff towards better patient care. Designed to help organizations create, organize, and manage training for their workforce, the HealthStream Learning Center enables educators to create learning courses using customizable templates, gamification features, microlearning aspects and authoring tools to enhance engagement. Address compliance needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Udemy Business helps companies stay competitive in today's rapidly changing workplace by offering fresh, on-demand learning content.
similar_products.features: Udemy Business helps companies achieve critical business outcomes and stay competitive by offering engaging on-demand, immersive, and cohort-based learning. With our integrated learning solutions and strategic partnership, we equip companies with the tools to build a future-ready workforce, increase employee engagement, and achieve business outcomes.

similar_products.short_desc: Learn how leading mid size companies easily train their remote teams from anywhere in the world with Trakstar Learn.
similar_products.features: Easily train your remote team with Trakstar's learning management software. Train from anywhere in the world with a learning management system for the modern workforce. Manage training across hundreds or thousands of employees in your organization. Learn how leading mid size companies use Trakstar Learn to quickly create quizzes and assessments, make training more impactful and never miss another compliance training deadline. See a free demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one system of learning that brings together learning, growth, skills, and capabilities into a personalized, curated experience.
similar_products.features: Cornerstone Learning helps you provide a connected learning and growth experience for your people. Create a personalized development and growth experience that inspires people and accelerates transformation. Get a solution designed to dynamically understand your users, connect them to personalized opportunities for growth and help them develop the skills that will get them here to there.

similar_products.short_desc: EdCast by Cornerstone is an AI-Powered LXP and Knowledge Cloud for Unified Discovery, Knowledge Management and Personalized Learning.
similar_products.features: EdCast by Cornerstone is an AI-Powered Learning Experience Platform (LXP) and Knowledge Cloud for Unified Discovery, Knowledge Management and Personalized Learning. Its award-winning platform is used internationally by Global 2000 companies and large government organizations, including NASSCOM and World Economic Forum, to solve the discovery and curation problems across all external and internal knowledge sources.

similar_products.short_desc: Engaging 23.5 million learners, Absorb LMS has the intuitive interface, agile features and 24/7 support to empower your organization.
similar_products.features: Absorb LMS empowers businesses across the globe to surpass learning goals. Built to deliver flexible training, the intuitive design and robust features create an engaging learning environment that keeps your employees, customers and partners coming back for more. Serving customers in 120 industry verticals, Absorb LMS offers automation and deep reporting capabilities to save time and prove ROI. Tap the scalable LMS that supports integration and security, while offering 24/7 in-house support.

similar_products.short_desc: Tovuti is an all-in-one eLearning platform that empowers companies of all kinds to activate the potential of their organization.
similar_products.features: Tovuti's all-in-one cloud-based learning management system (LMS) gives you all the tools you need to create, deliver, and track the effectiveness of your eLearning programs. Create engaging interactive courses in minutes using Tovuti's interactive modules and our easy to use course creation suite. Build as many courses and lessons as you need. Give learners a personal dashboard with everything relevant to their learning experiences such as courses, checklists, badges, certificates, and more!

similar_products.short_desc: Support the entire student journey from mastering academic concepts to extracurriculars with Blackbaud's forward-thinking LMS.
similar_products.features: Blackbaud Learning Management System delivers the necessary functionality from assignments and graded discussions to rubrics and competency-based education, to power academic programs in the classroom and online. Our robust partner ecosystem, LTI and OneRecord compliance further boost distance learning capabilities. Give educators the tools to create engaging course pages; coaches the ability to add announcements, post training videos and students can manage coursework from mobile devices.

similar_products.short_desc: The scalable learning management software that integrates with your current systems, streamlines training, and automates compliance.
similar_products.features:
The LMS software made to meet critical training, certification, and compliance needs in highly-skilled industries. Seertech's award-winning learning platform integrates with your current systems, streamlines training & certification, improves your operations, and manages your workforce all in one.

Suitable for enterprise businesses in mission-critical industries, your people will get access to virtualized learning, AI-based recommendations, continuing education, high stakes certification & more

similar_products.features: TalentLMS is the LMS built for training success. Designed to get a "yes" from everyone, it's where great teams, and companies, go to grow. With an experience that's fully customizable and easy to manage, teams embrace training while feeling right at home. TalentLMS makes it easy to provide the right training to any team and every use, while giving expert guidance and support every step of the way. On a mission to democratize training, TalentLMS already serves 70, 000+ teams worldwide.

similar_products.features: SAP Litmos Training delivers powerful but easy-to-use LMS features for admins and learners alike. It's known for quick deployment and simple integration with other key business systems, as well as automation of formerly time-consuming tasks, such as user onboarding and reporting. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Course Authoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Course Authoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Course authoring software enables organizations to develop customized training courses for educating employees, or for teachers to develop courses for their students. Course content can often be imported from multiple applications, and presented in different media formats. Once developed, courses can be published through a Learning Management System (LMS) or Training software, or as stand alone computer / web based training.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top eLearning Authoring tools on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of eLearning Authoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: eLearning Authoring Tools are used to create engaging, interactive educational content delivered through digital media and electronic devices.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Learning Experience Platform software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Learning Experience Platform tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Learning Experience Platforms (LEP) allow organizations to consolidate diverse training resources into a single place and provide personalized learning paths and experiences for each trainee.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mobile Learning software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mobile Learning tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mobile Learning software facilitates access to learning platforms on portable devices.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top School Administration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of School Administration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: School Administration software automates the administrative functions of schools including student information, admissions and records for school administrators, office managers, accountants and registrars. School Administration applications manage all school information via a single interface, including: student, family and staff data, courses and classes and faculty data. They provide integration for admissions, enrollment and class scheduling and also perform billing and tuition management functions. School Administration software is related to Classroom Management software, Gradebook software and School Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Talent Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Talent Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Talent Management software gives employers the tools to accurately manage, evaluate, and compensate based on employee performance. By tracking performance and standards, Talent Management software allows companies to create and maintain a high-performance workforce. Key features of this type of software include employee learning, compensation evaluations, policy compliance, and succession planning, all of which help companies manage personnel growth. Directories related to Talent Management software are Human Resource software, Performance Appraisal software, Succession Planning software, Training software, Workforce Management software, and Applicant Tracking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Training software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Training tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Training software, also known as eLearning or Computer-Based Training (CBT) software, automates educational activities for students and/or corporate employees. Training solutions are often customizable based on the needs of specific organizations and include capabilities such as course registration and testing, certification tracking, conferencing, skills tracking, and reporting. Training applications may provide the framework for presenting classes, as well as an ecommerce functions, to allow for payments. Training software is related to Courseware and Learning Management Systems (LMS).
